landing.title: Help end extreme poverty
landing.subtitle: Every tab helps send life-changing cash directly to people living in extreme poverty.

charityIntro.title: Stop wasting tabs, start changing the world
charityIntro.subTitle: With Tab for Ending Poverty, you can help put life-changing funds into the hands of families in extreme poverty across Africa. People in poverty deserve the dignity to choose for themselves how best to improve their lives – cash enables that choice.

steps.text: Send cash directly to people who need it most
Trust families in poverty to know best what they need
Help accelerate the end of extreme poverty

TFACIntro.title: Your tabs can make a difference in somebody’s life
TFACIntro.subtitle: By opening browser tabs, you can help end extreme poverty
TFACIntro.img1Subtext: ###### Open new tabs on your browser.
TFACIntro.img3Subtext: ###### Help support GiveDirectly in their quest to eradicate extreme poverty

Mission.subtitleText: To make giving back easier than ever
Mission.bodyText: We believe everyone should be able to help eradicate extreme poverty. Through our support of GiveDirectly, you can be sure each tab is supporting direct cash transfers to those in need.

Financials.title: Transparent Financials
Financials.text: Every tab makes an impact. Check out how much we've raised together.

questions.question: How does opening tabs raise money for charity?
questions.answer: Every time you open a new tab, there will be a few ads in the corner of your new tab page. These ads generate the revenue that funds our charitable impact. And the best part? It’s completely free!

questions.question: What nonprofit does Tab for Ending Poverty support?
questions.answer: Tab for Ending Poverty supports [GiveDirectly](https://www.givedirectly.org/?utm_source=tabforcause). We are proud to support this incredible organization that provides direct cash transfers to people living in extreme poverty

questions.question: How can I find out about new updates and announcements?
questions.answer: Stay in touch with us on social media! Follow us @tabforacause on [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@tabforacause), [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@tabforacause), [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/tabforacause/), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/TabForACause), and [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/TabForACause).

questions.question: This all sounds amazing! How else can I help?
questions.answer: Invite your friends and family to join in! Everybody who joins helps advance the mission of ending poverty.
